main event: On August 9, 1955, an observer spotted a silver disc-shaped object hovering in the sky for about 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object was the size of a grapefruit held at arm's length., The observer described the object as making no noise., The object appeared to have a disc-shaped appearance similar to a jet., The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds before the object flew out of sight., Heavy traffic was noted in the San Diego area at the time of the sighting.
